channel.title: Antoine Le Calvez on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Antoine Le Calvez on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Spam Attacks Analysis
item.description: Hunting moby dick, an analysis of 2015-2016 spam attacks https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1005525351517360129 Introduction Hi. Thanks for Breaking Bitcoin to invite me to speak and to present this research on Moby Dick. Moby Dick and spam attacks– let me explain, Moby Dick is an entity that spammed or sent a lot of transactions in bitcoin in 2015. We did some analysis on who this person is or what they were doing. This is bitcoin archaeology, where we analyze past activities and try to analyze what happened and get insight into what could happen.
